cause.description:
AMCO-USA is a non-profit 501 C 3 American organization with no political or religious affiliations which seeks to relieve poverty and lack of opportunity for the orphaned victims of war and tragedy in Lebanon.
1. All children deserve a life of dignity, access to proper shelter, care and education
2. Orphans deserve our support the most because their welfar and opportunity is strictly determined by the generosity of others
cause.mission: Provide humanitarian and educational assistance to the orphaned victims of war and tragedy primarily in Lebanon
cause.name: Al-Mabbarat: Defending the Orphans of Steadfast Lebanon
